bih4C3iTcsw.title: As a Small HOA Matures
bih4C3iTcsw.author: Edstar Analytics, Inc.
bih4C3iTcsw.description: This video gives an overview of what a small member-run HOA should know, and often does not know until issues arise.

hoa from the neighborhood there are not a lot of present concerns usually at that point because everything's new they do need to make sure that the common areas get mowed and that some landscaping gets done in some of the common areas not a lot of pressing issues come up for the volunteer board of directors to deal with in the beginning so we are going to take a look at what needs to be in place as the neighborhood matures we're going to break down the responsibilities of a mature hoa in terms of these components we've got the legal aspects we've got finances a reserve study is where volunteer boards don't pay close attention to in the beginning because no issues ever arise but it's important before the community matures to become aware of all the legal obligations of the board of
